#### Exploring Mendeley data

Setup

> change directory to /data-quality/alerts/

```{r child='alertssetup.Rmd', eval=FALSE}
knitr::purl("alertssetup.Rmd")
source("alertssetup.R")
unlink("alertssetup.R")
```

Get data

```{r alertsdata}
(res <- alerts_by_class(class_name='EventCountDecreasingError', limit=2000))
```

Get events data

```{r eventsdata}
dat <- alm_ids(res$article[1:5], source = "mendeley", info = "detail")
events <- alm_events(res$article[1:5], source = "mendeley")
```
